title: The new EU digital regulations: Explained
description: In this episode of the Sound of Economics, Giuseppe Porcaro is joined by Maria Demertzis, J. Scott Marcus, Georgios Petroupolos, and Mario Mariniello, Bruegel experts on digital policy to delve into the latest EU digital regulations: the Digital Services Act and the Digital Markets Act. What is the Commission proposing? What connections do these two bills have, and what policy and market implication do they have?
itunes:summary: Bruegel's experts walk you through all the details of the EU's Digital Services Act and Digital Markets Act.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
